title: The Mill on the Floss - he could find no comfort

content.question: Mr. Tulliver could find no comfort in his daughter's developing qualities because

choices.label: her goodness accentuated his feelings of despair
she remained too timid to explain her motivation
she could not understand his need for revenge

content.answer: her goodness accentuated his feelings of despair

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Explain the function of contrasts within a text.
